tool_description: A versatile text manipulation and search API designed with low code solutions in mind (Currently supporting Adalo for the fuzzy search endpoint with other low code platforms coming soon).
name: Text Search & Manipulation for Low Code
title: Text Search & Manipulation for Low Code
tool_name: Text Search & Manipulation for Low Code

api_list.name: Fuzzy Search
api_list.description:
**Attention**: please index your collection before using this endpoint
Use this endpoint as a custom action in your app to update an input against the content of which you could perform filtering on custom lists.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-search-manipulation-for-low-code.p.rapidapi.com/text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-search-manipulation-for-low-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Index
api_list.description: Use this endpoint in the browser to index an Adalo collection to enable fuzzy search in it, don't forget to get your [App Key](https://forum.adalo.com/t/i-dont-find-app-id/10788/2?u=taro)  [Api Key](https://help.adalo.com/integrations/the-adalo-api) as well as the [collection ID](https://forum.adalo.com/t/how-to-access-record-id-information/5390/2?u=taro).

api_list.name: Truncate Text
api_list.description: This endpoint allows the user to input a string of text and a number, and returns the specified number of words from the beginning of the string.
api_list.code:

api_list.name: Text into Paragraphs
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of Paragraphs from the provided text, depending on the value of number.
api_list.code:

api_list.name: Text into Sentences
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of sentences or chunks of sentences (Paragraphs) from the provided text, depending on the value of number.
